title: Wolf-Rüdiger Krause
text: Wolf-Rüdiger Krause (born 7 September 1944) is a German <a href="Association%20football">football</a> coach and a former player. As a player, he spent two seasons in the <a href="Fu%C3%9Fball-Bundesliga">Bundesliga</a> with <a href="Eintracht%20Braunschweig">Eintracht Braunschweig</a>.
